mapper.select: select q.qa_num qaNum, q.qa_title qaTitle, q.qa_content qaContent, q.qa_date qaDate, q.qa_answer qaAnswer, u.user_id userId, u.user_pwd password from qas q join users u on q.user_id = u.user_id order by qa_num desc

select q.qa_num qaNum, q.qa_title qaTitle, q.qa_content qaContent, q.qa_date qaDate, q.qa_answer qaAnswer, u.user_id userId, u.user_pwd password from qas q join users u on q.user_id = u.user_id where qa_num = #{qaNum}
mapper.insert: insert into qas(qa_num, qa_title, qa_content, qa_date, qa_answer, user_id) values(qanum_seq.nextval, #{qaTitle}, #{qaContent}, sysdate, #{qaAnswer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId})
